messages.message: Color space information is incompatible with KHR_texture_basisu.
messages.details: DFD block #1 primaries is KHR_DF_PRIMARIES_BT709 and transfer is KHR_DF_TRANSFER_LINEAR but KHR_texture_basisu requires either KHR_DF_PRIMARIES_BT709 with KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB or KHR_DF_PRIMARIES_UNSPECIFIED with KHR_DF_TRANSFER_LINEAR.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
